name: Rio de Janeiro Graduate Fair - QS World Grad School Tour
content: QS Quacquarelli Symonds, responsible for publishing one of the world's top university rankings, brings the QS World Grad School Tour, the international postgraduate fair, to Rio de Janeiro on February 5th. This is your chance to speak in person with representatives of some of the best universities in the world and get all the information to choose the postgraduate and study destination that best suits you. During the event: - Attend free seminars on the international university application process, scholarships, visas, preparatory exams and more! - Talk to admissions directors at top universities and get expert advice on your courses - Get a free resume review - Get a professional photo for your LinkedIn profile - Apply for over $ 7 million in scholarships - And compete for an Amazon Echo Show! Participating Universities and Institutions: Alliance Manchester, Montpellier Business School, Brock University, Chevening Scholarships, Jaume I University, Campus France, Education USA and more. Sign up today and get your free entry! URL: Facebook: https://go.evvnt.com/567811-2?pid=4868 Price: Free entrance: BRL 0.0 Time: 4:00 pm to 9:00 pm Venue Details: Hilton Rio de Janeiro Copacabana, Avenida Atlantica, 1020, Copacabana, Rio de Janeiro, 22010-000, Brazil
